overview: "The Circle Has Moved" is a short dance film made during COVID-19 isolation, directed and edited by Izaak Brandt. Dancers have been completely removed from a sense of community and identity during lockdown. This film aims to do two things: highlight this isolation whilst at the same time reinforcing the strength, diversity and unity of dancers worldwide. The film is brought together by a poem written and performed by Izaak Brandt, with an original score by Pete Brandt.
title: The Circle Has Moved
